name: lista-compras-microservices
description: Sistema de lista de compras com microsservi√ßos e mensageria RabbitMQ

scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:user" "npm run start:item" "npm run start:list" "npm run start:gateway"
scripts.start:full: concurrently "npm run start:user" "npm run start:item" "npm run start:list" "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:notification" "npm run start:analytics"
scripts.debug:all: concurrently "npm run debug:user" "npm run debug:item" "npm run debug:list" "npm run debug:gateway"
scripts.debug:full: concurrently "npm run debug:user" "npm run debug:item" "npm run debug:list" "npm run debug:gateway" "npm run debug:notification" "npm run debug:analytics"
scripts.debug:ports:all: concurrently "npm run debug:ports:user" "npm run debug:ports:item" "npm run debug:ports:list" "npm run debug:ports:gateway"
scripts.debug:ports:full: concurrently "npm run debug:ports:user" "npm run debug:ports:item" "npm run debug:ports:list" "npm run debug:ports:gateway" "npm run debug:ports:notification" "npm run debug:ports:analytics"
scripts.docker:setup: npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run setup:rabbitmq
scripts.setup:messaging: npm run docker:setup && sleep 5 && npm run start:full
